title: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park: Blind / Low Vision
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Blind / Low Vision              Blind / Low Vision       Chickamauga Battlefield Visitor Center For Those With Visual Impairments: The park brochure is available in braille. Audio description devices are available at the visitor center for the orientation film. Please ask for additional information at the information desk in the visitor center lobby. Chickamauga Battlefield For Those With Visual Impairments: There are several audio wayside exhibits located throughout the park. The park also has a cell phone tour. Please ask for additional information at the Chickamauga Battlefield Visitor Center. Lookout Mountain Battlefield Visitor Center For Those With Visual Impairments: The park brochure is available in braille.
